analysis.description:
MaticNetwork.startDate (/unique_chucks/16/0xe3d474f3686a831bf380498d1dbd57fdf972ca30.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0xe3d474f3686a831bf380498d1dbd57fdf972ca30.sol#222-234)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0xe3d474f3686a831bf380498d1dbd57fdf972ca30.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/16/0xe3d474f3686a831bf380498d1dbd57fdf972ca30.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0xe3d474f3686a831bf380498d1dbd57fdf972ca30.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
